endpoints.name: Extract URL Metadata
endpoints.description: Fetch and extract HTML metadata from a specified URL. Returns all HTML meta tags, Open Graph tags, Twitter tags, headings, image tags, and response headers. Set includeResponseBody=true to return entire response body as a string. Useful for SEO and AI research projects.

url.description: The URL from which to extract HTML metadata

includeResponseBody.description: If set to 'true', includes the full HTML response body as a string in the result

endpoints.name: Generate QR Code
endpoints.description: Generates a QR code image for any URL. Returns the QR code as a base64-encoded PNG data URL that can be directly embedded in HTML or downloaded. Useful for creating shareable QR codes.

url.description: The URL to encode in the QR code
